column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////It took 20minutes for the server to greet us and take our drink order
column2: and another HOUR for the food to come once we placed our order. Anyway when the food came
column3: it was a disaster! We took one bite of the shrimp and grits and sent it back immediately- it tasked like... cream of wheat with tomato sauce on top *gags*. 3 of us ended up sending back our meals. I re-ordered and got avocado toast because I was starving at that point
column4: but the other 2 people I was with just gave up and said they'd order food at the next stop of Sunday Funday.
